turkish_example_sentence: Sabah erkenden ofiste çalışıp akşam yorgun eve döndü.
english_example_sentence: Having worked early in the morning at the office, he returned home tired in the evening.
russian_example_sentence: Поработав рано утром в офисе, он вернулся домой усталым вечером.
